createCurrentSessionContextInstance(SessionFactoryImplementor, Class) - Method in SessionFactoryProxyFactory
Usually we Hibernate is responsible for making an instance of CurrentSessionContext, but that would cause the implementation to contain a reference to the actual SessionFactory and not the proxy.
